name: Azur Soft
overview: Founded in 1986, Azur Soft company acts in the Information Technology, system integration, software development and user training. Azur Soft owns the AS ELECTRONIQUE company specialized in electronic equipment design. Azur Soft develops in these activities : -Real-time project (signal processing, supervision) -Security alarms monitoring system with the Horus software developed and distributed in France and Europe using a “Competence Centers” network. -Specific software development. -Security Audit Azur Soft is a software development and deployment specialist in these fields : -Embedded “real-time” systems -Networks -Databases -Graphical user interfaces Some figures -Over twenty years of experience in software development field -500.000â‚¬ independent assets -A team of twenty people, including twelve software engineers and three electronic engineers. -An average income of 4Mâ‚¬ for the last five years -More than 200 functional installations in Alarm monitoring rooms all over the world
